sourcesContent:
Current users

{{ user }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { UserService } from '../user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent { usernames: string[] = ['Hugo']; username: string = ''; team: string = '1'; status: string ='online'; constructor(private userService: UserService) {} onSubmit() { this.userService.addUser(this.username, this.team, this.status).subscribe( () => { console.log('User added successfully!'); this.userService.getUsernames().subscribe( usernames => this.usernames = usernames ); }, error => console.error(error) ); } ngOnInit() { console.log('usernames should be displayed here') this.userService.getUsernames().subscribe( usernames => this.usernames = usernames ); console.log(this.usernames); } }
